item.description: S﻿uperstar fullback Tom Trbojevic looks set to stick fat with Manly and sign a new contract worth as much as $3 million. That's according to The Sydney Morning Herald, who broke the news on Friday the Sea Eagles will table a fresh three-year deal to the 28-year-old.

item.title: NRL semi-finals 2025: Cronulla Sharks beat Canberra Raiders as Nicho Hynes, Braydon Trindall, Addin Fonua-Blake star
item.description: Canberra's dream has turned to disaster.﻿ Three weeks after winning the club's first minor premiership since 1990, the Raiders have suffered a second consecutive finals defeat to go tumbling out of the title race via the quickest route possible. The Sharks dealt the killer blow in a comprehensive win in Canberra on Saturday night, handing the Raiders a 32-12 defeat.
